Sentencas: The performances of single cell solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks with Ni/8YSZ (8 mol% Y2O3 doped ZrO2) and Ni/10CGO (10 mol% Gd2O3 doped CeO2) anodes were compared with respect to sulfur poisoning (1-50 ppm) with H-2/H2O/N-2 fuel mixture at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Comparison of the performances of single cell solid oxide fuel cell stacks with Ni/8YSZ and Ni/10CGO anodes with H2S containing fuel

Sentencas: The mechanisms of the sulfur poisoning and regeneration of Ni/8YSZ and Ni/10CGO anodes at the triple phase boundaries are discussed.
Titulo: Comparison of the performances of single cell solid oxide fuel cell stacks with Ni/8YSZ and Ni/10CGO anodes with H2S containing fuel

Sentencas: The effects of various parameters as H2S contamination cycles, H2S concentration, current density, H2O concentration and contamination durations were examined.
Titulo: Comparison of the performances of single cell solid oxide fuel cell stacks with Ni/8YSZ and Ni/10CGO anodes with H2S containing fuel

Sentencas: A mechanism for the progress of the sulfur poisoning in the anode is proposed.
Titulo: Comparison of the performances of single cell solid oxide fuel cell stacks with Ni/8YSZ and Ni/10CGO anodes with H2S containing fuel

Sentencas: It is shown that theoretically it is possible to calculate the nickel surface area accessible for the sulfur adsorption in the anode using H2S poisoning behavior for Ni/8YSZ anodes.
Titulo: Comparison of the performances of single cell solid oxide fuel cell stacks with Ni/8YSZ and Ni/10CGO anodes with H2S containing fuel

Sentencas: The sulfur poisoning mechanisms of Ni/8YSZ and of Ni/10CGO anodes are proposed by taking into account the different oxidation mechanisms of H-2 in the anodes considered in previous studies.
Titulo: Comparison of the performances of single cell solid oxide fuel cell stacks with Ni/8YSZ and Ni/10CGO anodes with H2S containing fuel

Sentencas: The higher sulfur resistance of Ni/10CGO is explained with its high mixed ionic electronic conductivity as well as its ability to adsorb H-2.
Titulo: Comparison of the performances of single cell solid oxide fuel cell stacks with Ni/8YSZ and Ni/10CGO anodes with H2S containing fuel

Sentencas: Due to these properties CGO can continue electrochemical reactions even when nickel is covered with sulfur.
Titulo: Comparison of the performances of single cell solid oxide fuel cell stacks with Ni/8YSZ and Ni/10CGO anodes with H2S containing fuel
